item.title: Hugo first impression
item.description: I was a Jekyll user, but I just decided start using Hugo reading a friend’s article. Any advantage? Oh, yeah… Installing Hugo is much easier than installing all that Ruby stuff. I did not edit many Jekyll themes, but with Hugo it looks better also. Disadvantage? One at least. It’s a little harder to host your Hugo site at Github. The official Hugo documentation did not help me it all, I could only do that reading this post.
